titleStmt.title: AD ORNATISSIMVM VIRVM, D. GVLIELMVM MORAVIVM hujus libelli & alterius, non ita pridem de morte editi, Authorem.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: AD ORNATISSIMVM VIRVM, D. GVLIELMVM MORAVIVM hujus libelli & alterius, non ita pridem de morte editi, Authorem.

monogr.title: Nyne songs collected out of the Holy Scriptures of Old and New Testament, drawne foorth of the pure fountaines of Hebreuu and Greeke ; translated, paraphrased in prose, summed, analysed, notted vpon, grounds for vse and doctrine observed in every one of them, and finally paraphrased in English meeter, by Mr. William Moray
monogr.author: Morray, William

div.head: AD ORNATISSIMVM VIRVM, D. GVLIELMVM MORAVIVM hujus libelli & alterius, non ita pridem de morte editi, Authorem.
div.l: AEGro fallebat curas de morte libellus:
Nunc hymnis laeto cor tibi ritè salit.
Dum Musas sacro deducis fonte novenas,
Olim voce gregem pascebas sedulus; at jam
Pagina, quà liceat, pascit amoena tua.
Eia age, nè pigeat saeclis prodesse futuris;
Hic animos recreat moesta{que} corda labor.
Dignus luce cluet, meruit virtute superstes
Qui bene de cunctis, post obitum{que} meret.
